In this segment of the audio, the interviewer begins discussing the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on various aspects of life, including small businesses, layoffs, and housing displacement. The split-screen image in the background shows two women with the LWV (League of Women Voters) logo in the lower-left corner and the MetroEast logo in the lower-right corner. The harp sound plays briefly before the interview continues. Therefore, the relevant time segment for this excerpt is from 00:06:37 to 00:06:53.

The correct answer is C: [00:06:53 - 00:08:03]. 

The program transitions to blue star-themed closing screens with LWV voter information and an on-screen ballot reminder at approximately 6 minutes and 53 seconds into the video, lasting until 8 minutes and 3 seconds.
